metadata.title: CVE-2018-4272 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue affected versions prior to iOS 11.4.1, tvOS 11.4.1,watchOS 4.3.2, Safari 11.1.2, iTunes 12.8 for Windows, iCloud for Windows7.6.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4272` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
